name: Creating Engaging Remote Retrospectives - Creativity + Immersion = Engagement

description.html:
This talk will be online via Zoom. Anyone who sets themselves to "attending" will get details of how to dial in closer to the time. Any questions please get in touch.

About the Talk

This workshop will explore how we can create immersive retrospective experiences for those we work with During the workshop, together as a group, we will crowdsource a theme and create an immersive retrospective together, one which will be community owned We will then discuss what approaches and methods I use for creating these experiences and for keeping attendees engaged in this increasingly remote working world.

About the Speaker

Chris Stone - The Virtual Agile Coach

For ten years now Chris has been fostering an environment for success of high-performing teams and organizations through the use of the agility. He's worked across a wide range of industries and with some of the largest organizations in the world, as well as with smaller, more lean enterprises.

As The Virtual Agile coach, he intends to enable frictionless innovation, regardless of location. He's therefore a firm believer in enabling agility whilst working virtually. Through this platform, he'll share his advice, guidance, coaching, mentoring and training, along with a series of actionable experiments for you to try.
